mapper.sql: guid as guid ,app_code as appCode ,app_name as appName ,app_type as appType ,isopen as isopen ,open_date as openDate ,url as url ,app_desc as appDesc ,guid_emp_maintenance as guidEmpMaintenance ,guid_role_maintenance as guidRoleMaintenance ,remark as remark ,iniwp as iniwp ,intaskcenter as intaskcenter ,ip_addr as ipAddr ,ip_port as ipPort
